attributes.title: U WON’T REGRET READING THIS
attributes.review:
I’ve been waiting since 2016 to download this app. 2016 YALL. 😡 THATS 4 YEARS. JUST TO DOWNLOAD AN APP. Ofc when it finally downloads, this mf wants my phone #. I DONT WANT TO GIVE U MY NUMBER DUMB ASS. IS THERE NOT A WAY TO GET IT STRAIGHT TO BARRON WITHOUT THIS KIND OF HASSLE. Why else do u think I downloaded this, ✨I want Barron.✨ But ofc nothings that simple in life. We were supposed to run away together and live happily ever after. I DID NOT WAIT 4 YEARS FOR THIS. 😭😭 Ever day for 4 years, waking up hoping today was the day I could introduce myself to him 🥰🥰 DO U EVEN UNDERSTAND THAT PAIN. IM SO DISAPPOINTED IN THIS, I HOPE IT GETS DELETED SO NO ONE ELSE HAS TO EXPERIENCE WHAT IVE FELT 😢😞

 anyway luvs I hope u have an amazing day and pls let me know if u find any other way to contact Barron 😍😘

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I would rather have every single bone in my body break then give this app a better rating.

attributes.title: Many Issues
attributes.review: This app is horrifically built. I will not be using this app, rather the website but thank you for trying? I really do not support this app usage as there is lag, when the app opens, the background looks disgusting. I suggest going on the website and reporting that too, there’s no difference. :/

attributes.title: Takes information
attributes.review: I actually support trump but when I looked through the privacy policy it said that they actually keep your payment information so no thank you I won’t be downloading the app again because I don’t want people stealing from my bank account

attributes.title: Aids
attributes.review: Unfortunately when I downloaded the app I started getting aids and my nut sack just gave out negative sunlight. App isn’t good and customer service was mean to me and now I’m sad... lmaoooo

attributes.title: Crashed my phone!
attributes.review: Crashed my phone! Deleted all my stuff! Do not recommend!

attributes.title: Trash🥰💞🧚🏼‍♀️💘🙈 cero stars😉💘🥰
attributes.review: The app took like a month to instal, when it finally installed the mf app banned me for been Hispanic 🥰. The walking Cheeto is a racist, rapist, homophobic, between many other things, and thinks he’s the only one that matters🥳. He doesn’t believe on climate change, but it makes sense because he has a bunker to hide when climate is going to kill everybody. mister I'm a cowardly idiot but I'm "important" doesn’t care 🥺👉🏼👈🏼. Anyway the app is telling me irrelevant news but I’m still banned 😚. BLACK LIVES MATTER ✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼✊🏻✊❤️. Btw for a relevant news, pass Barron’s number 😳😉😏😗. God bless you🧡.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: Worst possible app, serves no real purpose whatsoever!!

attributes.title: ‼️‼️‼️PLEASE AVOID THIS APP!!! ‼️‼️‼️
attributes.review:
‼️‼️‼️‼️🚫PLEASE AVOID THIS APP UNTIL ITS FIXED!!🚫‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️
This app made my phone crash and over heat!!! i know we need to support our *lovely* president donald trump but this app is dangerous, it's almost like making your phone into a bomb! I asked about it in my fishing group of facebook (using my son's phone because MY phone wasn't working at the time) and they said if you're phone heats up too much it can explode?! So I hurried to delete the app so it doesn't hurt my family, because that's what a father does, right?! Plus I learned if it crashes you have to spend hours on the phone with tech support, and they were barely helpful, so if you'd rather not deal with all the worry and stress I'd recommend sticking to websites, it's better than risking your families life and wasting your time with customer support!

attributes.title: My dog is now dead
attributes.review: Yesterday morning I woke up and decided to see what all of this was about, this Cheeto of a president is my absolute hero 🤩 I opened it to see that my phone was now completely hacked 😘 then a knock on my door made me jump after I saw a message pop up on my phone that said “your family will die tonight” as soon as I opened the door a man with a gun shot my dog and said “Toodle ooh!” Then threw rotten potatoes on my front lawn like Santa clause 😊 As my dog was profusely bleeding on the floor I heard my mother scream in terror, I ran upstairs to see her going crazy like when those people looked at the monsters in bird box. Of course this happened because she too downloaded the app 😅 she then collapsed onto the floor and her lifeless body was eaten by the rats planted in our house by the trump administration who woulda thought they would be so nice to us 🥰 you’ll be missed noodles 🐶 and maybe you too mom but I don’t really think I’ll miss you after you took my phone away on Friday for eating my dogs food 😡
